description:
NONO ADVENTURE is classic nonogram game with a little twist!

- Over 300 hand crafted pixel art levels to complete. Each one unlocks the picture and some trivia about it!
- Story mode where NONO - the great adventurer tells you about his biggest adventure yet! Help him remember the details by solving some puzzles!
- Random mode where puzzle is being generated. You will never run out of puzzle to solve!
- Customize the colors of the puzzle to your liking - you can go with theme that suits you the best!
name: NONO ADVENTURE
